note: Retired Lit/Writing teacher, Yale/USC. Special interests: folklore and critical theory, especially Benjamin and Habermas. Four bestest-ever kids: M, G, L, & T! On Twitter, I read a lot and commented a little if I had some clarifying knowledge. But I’m leaving Twitter because I don’t want to contribute to its Muskification in any way. Boycotts are an underused tool in our society, IMO: shouldn’t Blue states boycott Red states (contracts, travel, etc.) to force a more representative Senate?
